title: Trends in digital media consumption
itunes:title: Trends in digital media consumption
description: Consumers today have more digital media options than ever before. But many say they have to work too hard—and pay too much—to piece together their entertainment experience. Will the costs start to outweigh the benefits?
content:encoded: Consumers today have more digital media options than ever before. But many say they have to work too hard—and pay too much—to piece together their entertainment experience. Will the costs start to outweigh the benefits?
itunes:subtitle: Consumers today have more digital media options than ever before. But many say they have to work too hard—and pay too much—to piece together their entertainment experience. Will the costs start to outweigh the benefits?
itunes:author: Deloitte US
